loonR 0.1.515

Perform hypergeometric test

Source: R/Heatmap.R
hyperGeoTest.Rd

Perform hypergeometric test

hyperGeoTest(
  row.group,
  col.group,
  row.prefix = "",
  col.prefix = "",
  lower.tail = FALSE,
  title = "",
  log10.lowest = 5,
  print.fig = TRUE
)

Arguments

lower.tail

Default FALSE
log10.lowest

Default 3. Minimux or maximum log10 value. Useful when meet inf or draw heatmap
print.fig

Default print the figure

Value

list(pval.df.log, pval.df, plot)

Examples

g1 = sample(c("G1","G2","G3"),10, replace = T)
g2 = sample(c("1","2","3"),10, replace = T)
loonR::hyperGeoTest(g1, g2, col.prefix = "E")
#> Warning: The input is a data frame, convert it to the matrix.

#> $pval.df.log
#>            E1        E2        E3
#> G1 0.07918125 0.1497623 0.1497623
#> G2 0.87506126 0.0000000 0.0000000
#> G3 0.01046543 0.3010300 0.3010300
#> 
#> $pval.df.notFormated
#>           E1        E2        E3
#> G1 0.8333333 0.7083333 0.7083333
#> G2 0.1333333 1.0000000 1.0000000
#> G3 0.9761905 0.5000000 0.5000000
#> 
#> $pval.df
#>    E1         E2         E3        
#> G1 "8.33e-01" "7.08e-01" "7.08e-01"
#> G2 "1.33e-01" "1.00e+00" "1.00e+00"
#> G3 "9.76e-01" "5.00e-01" "5.00e-01"
#> 
#> $table
#>          col.group
#> row.group E1 E2 E3
#>        G1  1  1  1
#>        G2  2  0  0
